column4: does anyone (preferably with building experience) feel like trying to compile gephex? i tried everything
stupid question, have you read the README files etc. ?
does it fail for unmet build deps?
yeah i did, and nope nu unmet dependencies
pastebin the build log please.
ok, just a minute
config.log ?
the output of the terminal when you build
ok, let me build it again in that case
do u need everything or is whatever fits in the terminal ok?
make > make.log
ok
that will make a file called "make.log" :)
i know :-)
its building, this will take a few minutes
brb 2 minutes
using the alternate cd, you can choose a "cli only system"... just like the server one.
are you talking about the alternate xubuntu cd? would the result be as good as with server? or debian as dyrne suggested

the alternate cd for any release, ubuntu/kubuntu/xubuntu has the option of a cli only install, which installs the same cli system regardless of what cd you use. same as with the server cd and choosing no extra services
nice
sudo apt-get install xserver-xorg i guess
